SELECT ur.Id, ur.UserId, u.UserName, ur.RoleId, r.RoleName from user as u, user_role as ur, role as r
where ur.UserId=u.UserId and ur.RoleId=r.RoleId
where ur.UserId=u.UserId and ur.RoleId=r.RoleId and u.UserName like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
ORDER BY Id ASC limit #{beginPage},#{pageSize}
